title: Inside the REAL Barbie Malibu Dreamhouse - which can be YOURS for just $60 a night!
text:
Advertisement

Barbie girls can now live in a real Barbie world - as Airbnb celebrates the iconic doll's 60th anniversary by offering a once-in-a-lifetime stay at her Malibu Dreamhouse.

The glamorous ocean-front home in the heart of California's beach city, which includes a infinity pool and walk in wardrobe, will be listed on the online-based marketplace later this month for a one-time, two night stay, for four guests on October 27, this year.

Costing just $60 (£46) a night, the life-size reproduction of Barbie's Dreamhouse boasts the brand's signature pink style across the lavish over-the-top mansion.

Airbnb is celebrating Barbie's 60th anniversary by offering a once-in-a-lifetime stay at her Malibu Dreamhouse (pictured). Four guests can enjoy a one-time, two-night stay on October 27, this year

The glamorous ocean-front home boasts a meditation room (pictured), filled with comfortable cushions, modern yellow chairs and potted plants, as well as adorable roof lighting

For budding fashionistas there is a walk-in closet (seen above), filled with life-sized Barbie clothes from the past 60 years. The attire includes uniforms from the many careers the doll has taken on during her fictional time - such as an astronaut and a firefighter

With an infinity pool, the Barbie Malibu Dreamhouse is the perfect place to relax with three friends. The glamorous ocean-front home in the heart of California's beach city will be listed on the online-based marketplace later this month

Costing just $60 (£46) a night (plus fees and taxes), the life-size reproduction of Barbie's Dreamhouse boasts the brand's signature pink style across the lavish over-the-top mansion

It also offers two bedrooms, one seen above, two bathrooms and a hobby studio, all decked out with pink and golden decor, for four lucky visitors

With an infinity pool, a personal cinema, a sports court, as well as a fully stocked kitchen, the grand abode certainly has enough ways to entertain.

It also offers two bedrooms, two bathrooms, a meditation area, and a hobby studio, all decked out with pink and golden decor, for four lucky visitors.

And for budding fashionistas there is a walk-in closet, filled with life-sized Barbie clothes from the past 60 years.

Surrounded by gorgeous scenery, the Malibu Dreamhouse features three floors filled with fun, stylish rooms - including a personal cinema and a sports court

Pink is the theme in this lavish bathroom, with the large bathtub even being filled with white and salmon coloured plastic balls

During the two night event, guests will get to meet a host of powerful women to commemorate Barbie's message of girl empowerment. Pictured: The infinity pool

During the two night event, guests will get to meet a host of powerful women to commemorate Barbie's message of girl empowerment. Pictured: A work station in the over-the-top mansion

A fully stocked kitchen is available for four lucky guests, who will stay at the abode from October 27 to October 29, this year

The attire includes uniforms from the many careers the doll has taken on during her fictional time - such as an astronaut and a firefighter.

During the two night event, guests will get to meet a host of powerful women to commemorate Barbie's message of girl empowerment.

Those staying at the Dreamhouse will be treated to a one-on-one fencing lesson with fencing medallist Ibtihaj Muhammad, plus a cooking lesson with one of Malibu’s favourite female business owners, Gina Clarke-Helm of Malibu Seaside Chef.

The glamorous desk found in the Dreamhouse, featuring golden stationary and a soft pink laptop, as well as a matching chair

A grand, pink enormous speaker sits as decoration next to two comfy-looking, white sun loungers and a stylish-looking guitar

Those staying at the Dreamhouse (pictured) will be treated to a one-on-one fencing lesson with fencing medallist Ibtihaj Muhammad, plus a cooking lesson with one of Malibu’s favourite female business owners, Gina Clarke-Helm of Malibu Seaside Chef

They will also receive a makeover from Mane Addicts Creator Collective hairstylists, and attend a meet-and-greet with celebrity hairstylist Jen Atkin.

The trip is set to be completed with a behind-the-scenes tour of Columbia Memorial Space Centre with pilot and aerospace engineer Jill Meyers.

The Airbnb booking for the Dreamhouse opens on October 23 at 7pm.
description: The glamorous ocean-front home in the heart of California's beach city will be listed on Airbnb later this month for a one-time, two night stay, for four guests on October 27, this year.
